message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $120. I believe it's a great deal and will be valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I could meet you halfway at $105. This is a very fair offer considering its value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $95 is a bit too high. I'd be willing to pay $92 for it
